idea-plugin.name: Base16 Windows 95 Light
idea-plugin.vendor: Fergus Collins (https://github.com/C-Fergus), Shirom Makkad, and the Base16 project
idea-plugin.description:
Base 16 Windows 95 Light for Jetbrains IDE


---------------


Colors by Fergus Collins (https://github.com/C-Fergus). Theme made using base16(https://github.com/chriskempson/base16). Theme generated by Shirom Makkad (https://github.com/ShiromMakkad/base16-jetbrains-ide)
